product_site.apps module

class product_site.apps.ProductSiteConfig(app_name, app_module)[source]

Bases: AppConfig

default_auto_field = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
name = 'product_site'

product_site.models module

product_site.tests module

product_site.urls module

URL paths for app ‘product-site’ serving as django project site home and integrated with app ‘crafts_by_micks’ - admin control.

product_site.views module

Views Module for Django App ‘product_site’. App serves as central site for web application.

Methods:

logincheck(request)()

Determine if a current user is authenticated

populate_display_products(all_products)()

validate and sort a list of products for website display - checking at least one price has been set

create_product_list()

Retrieve all Categories and Products from database, Sort Products into their categories - sorting Products and Categories in Alphabetical order according to title. Performs product validation for website display

site_home(request)()
Render main site home page, checking if currently logged-in user is a staff

member allowing access to admin control functionality

determine_discount_percentage(labels)()

Using QuerySet of associated Labels for a Product, determine highest assigned label percentage discount to apply a Product

product_view(request, product_id, error)()

Retrieve Attributes and Selected Pricing for rendering of Individual Product Webpage showing Product Details, Pricing and validation of customer login for addition of Product to an Order.

create_retrieve_order(request)()
Determine Order for currently logged in user to add selected Product_Item.

If no open order is present, create a new open order for user.

create_order_item(request, product_id)()
Retrieve Product Attributes and user selected Attributes for a Selected Product.

Validate against chosen price(s) and size(s) and add Product to open Order for User.

main_image_control(order_items)()

Retrieve main image and matching id for products and return as list

customer_orders(request, message)()
Retrieve current logged in customer info and matching Orders information

for display to client

remove_item(request, item_id, order_id)()

Delete an Order_Item from an order. Delete order if all Order Items have been removed.

view_order(request, order_id, message)()
Retrieve current order (processing or completed status) details for

display to customer.

submit_order(request, order_id)()
Retrieve an order submitted for processing and change order status

to received

product_review(request, order_item_id, order_id)()
Allow logged-in user to submit a review for a product that has been paid for

and delivered

review_rating_update(applied_rating, product)()
Calculate New Average Review rating for a product after a new review

has been added for the product

save_review(request, product_id, order_id)()
Retrieve customer review attributes and preferences to create new product

review and assign to the Product

product_site.views.create_order_item(request, product_id)[source]
Retrieve Product Attributes and user selected Attributes for a Selected Product.

Validate against chosen price(s) and size(s) and add Product to open Order for User.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – used to retrieve Product and Selected Attributes from Product_Page

  • product_id (int) – unique Primary Key value for selected Product

Returns:

user to site home page

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.create_product_list()[source]

Retrieve all Categories and Products from database, Sort Products into their categories - sorting Products and Categories in Alphabetical order according to title. Performs product validation for website display.

Returns:

list containing tuples as: (category_name, list of valid Products)

Return type:

list

product_site.views.create_retrieve_order(request)[source]
Determine Order for currently logged in user to add selected Product_Item.

If no open order is present, create a new open order for user.

Parameters:

request (HTTPRequest object) – needed to determine current logged-in user

Returns:

open order to add a Product Item to or new open Order

Return type:

Class Order instance

product_site.views.customer_orders(request, message)[source]
Retrieve current logged in customer info and matching Orders information

for display to client

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – Retrieved current logged-in customer and render html page showing order info

  • message (str) – Message to display to user for successful submission of an order for processing

Returns:

user to view customer orders page

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.determine_discount_percentage(labels)[source]

Using QuerySet of associated Labels for a Product, determine highest assigned label percentage discount to apply a Product.

Parameters:

labels (QuerySet Label) – QuerySet containing Labels that have been assigned to a Product.

Returns:

Highest Percentage Discount applicable to Product Prices

Return type:

int

product_site.views.logincheck(request)[source]

Determine if a current user is authenticated.

Parameters:

request (HTTPRequest object) – needed to authenticate current user

Returns:

True for authenticated user, False if not

Return type:

boolean

product_site.views.main_image_control(order_items)[source]

Retrieve main image and matching id for products and return as list.

Parameters:

order_items (list) – list containg selected Order_Items to retrieve product id and main image from

Returns:

list containing product id’s and matching main images

Return type:

list

product_site.views.populate_display_products(all_products)[source]

validate and sort a list of products for website display - checking at least one price has been set.

Parameters:

all_products (list) – list containing unvalidated Products

Returns:

validated list of Products

Return type:

list

Note

Products without prices are allowed in system (in creation process by admin),

but may not be displayed on the product site

product_site.views.product_review(request, order_item_id, order_id)[source]

Allow logged-in user to submit a review for a product that has been paid for and delivered.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – used to render product review page

  • order_item_id (int) – primary key for product item to be reviewed

  • order_id (int) – primary key of current order needed to return user to order view after review of product is submitted

Returns:

user to product review page

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.product_view(request, product_id, error)[source]

Retrieve Attributes and Selected Pricing for rendering of Individual Product Webpage showing Product Details, Pricing and validation of customer login for addition of Product to an Order.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – required for user authentication, status check and html page render

  • product_id (int) – unique Primary Key value for selected Product

  • error (str) – description of error to display to user on page - current implementation accounts for addition of Product to Order without selection of Size and Associated Price

Returns:

page displaying selected Product Attributes for addition to an order or view of Product details by user

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.remove_item(request, item_id, order_id)[source]

Delete an Order_Item from an order. Delete order if all Order Items have been removed.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – render Orders Display page

  • item_id (int) – primary key field for Order_Time to be deleted

  • order_id (int) – primary key field for Order holding selecting Order Item

Returns:

customer to view orders page

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.review_rating_update(applied_rating, product)[source]
Calculate New Average Review rating for a product after a new review

has been added for the product

Parameters:

  • applied_rating (int) – value of review_rating added to a product

  • product (class Product instance) – product whose review rating needs to be re-calculated

Returns:

no return

product_site.views.save_review(request, product_id, order_id)[source]
Retrieve customer review attributes and preferences to create new product

review and assign to the Product.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – used to render product review page

  • product_id (int) – primary key of product to which review is to be added

  • order_id (int) – primary key of current order with product being reviewed

Returns:

user to view order page

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.site_home(request)[source]
Render main site home page, checking if currently logged-in user is a staff

member allowing access to admin control functionality. Retrieves validated and sorted list of Categories and associated Products for home page display.

Parameters:

request (HTTPRequest object) – required for user authentication, status check and html page render

Returns:

site home page

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.submit_order(request, order_id)[source]
Retrieve an order submitted for processing and change order status

to received.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – Used to return customer to view orders page

  • order_id (int) – primary key of order being submitted for processing

Returns:

user to view orders page

Return type:

HTTPResponse

product_site.views.view_order(request, order_id, message)[source]
Retrieve current order (processing or completed status) details for

display to customer.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTPRequest object) – render html page displaying order info

  • order_id (int) – primary key for order details being requested

  • message (str) – informative message to display to customer

Returns:

user to view order page

Return type:

HTTPResponse
